hints.content:
First, let's fill in $\purpleD{700}+\blueE{20}+\maroonD1$ on the place value chart.

$\begin{align}
\purpleD{700} &= \purpleD{7}\text{ hundreds}\\\\
\blueE{20} &= \blueE{2}\text{ tens}\\\\
\maroonD1 &= \maroonD1\text{ one}
\end{align}$


Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-:
$\purpleD{7}$ | $\blueE2$ | $\maroonD1$

Now, let's say the number $\purpleD7\blueE2\maroonD1$ out loud and write it in written form.

$\purpleD{\text{seven hundred}}\blueE{\text{ twenty-}}\maroonD{\text{one}}$

The correct answers are:

- $721$

- Seven hundred twenty-one
